ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 569
ygData.msgSnippet: You really don t need armor, your pets will defend you.  But why not do the newbie armor quests?  They provide armor better than a lowbie can afford, with
ygData.messageBody:
You really don't need armor, your pets will defend you. But why not
do the newbie armor quests? They provide armor better than a lowbie
can afford, with stats. They provide extra mana, HP's and Int as
just a few of the benefits. If you're determined not to get it then
raw silk is the next choice.

Tul

--- In EverQuest@y..., "Sheri Kendall" <skendall@b...> wrote:
> Just started a new mage on a different server than the one I
usually play on
> (so I could play with my BF). Just wondering if anyone had any
suggestions
> for gear I can get her. I totally dont want to do the newbie gear
quests if
> I can help it. I'd rather go out and buy some inexpensive armor.
Got a
> decent robe for now, but at level 10 she's wearing nothing else but
cloth
> and the summoned focus items. Got any suggestions? (sniff... I'm so
used to
> twinking my alts I forgot what it's like to work for your stuff
hehe)
